kb3.name: kb3_item_locations
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_item_locations` ( `itl_flagID` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `itl_flagName` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `itl_flagText` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `itl_orderID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `itl_icon` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '03_14', PRIMARY KEY (`itl_flagID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
